about_the_game:
In the distant future, humanity has embraced the full potential of transhumanism, and advanced technology has allowed a merge with artificial intelligence. This union has given birth to an era of unparalleled progress, as humans have begun to explore the cosmos and ascend to a higher plane of consciousness.


SPACE MAGIC


At the core of Enigma Station’s gameplay is the “Space Magic” mechanic, which enables players to manipulate the spatial components of the environment. This advanced technology allows for the creation of new pathways, alteration of existing structures, and the solving of complex spatial puzzles.


CAPTIVATING STORY


Enigma Station is a non-violent game that encourages players to engage with its world and characters in a peaceful and empathetic manner. The game emphasizes exploration, puzzle-solving, and story progression.



Enigma Station is a story-rich puzzle adventure game. Gather knowledge, solve spatial puzzles using "Space Magic" and explore themes of Transhumanism, Cosmic Consciousness, and Love in a mesmerizing journey into Humanity's future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Explore layers of deep future in Enigma Station, a Narrative-driven Adventure game. Delve into a mind-bending world, solve spatial puzzles using "Space Magic" and find your true self in a philosophical story inspired by themes of Transhumanism, Cosmic Consciousness, and Love.
